definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Je 17:8 heat;—[[חׂם]] abs. Ge 8:22 + 3 t. + 1Sa 21:7 (v. infr.); cstr. Ge 18:1+ 3 t.; of heat of (mid-) day [[חׂם היום]] Ge 18:1 (J), 1Sa 11:11, 2Sa 4:5; in promise of regular seasons Ge 8:22 (opp. [[קׂר]]); cf. Is 18:4, Is 18:4 ([[קָחִיר]] ´[[ח]]); but as dangerous to plant-life Je 17:8; it melts snow Job 24:l9; [[לֶחֶם חׂם]] 1Sa 21:7 bread of heat = hot bread, rd. perhaps [[חָם]] ´[[ל]] (as Jos 9:12).
